body: Nit:  prefer `const auto&` or `const auto*`, right now it's hard to know if the iterated thing is a pointer or a value
body_html: Nit: prefer const auto& or const auto*, right now it's hard to know if the iterated thing is a pointer or a value
body_text: Nit:  prefer const auto& or const auto*, right now it's hard to know if the iterated thing is a pointer or a value
